channel.title: others on BloxTop
channel.description: Recent content in others on BloxTop

item.title: Halving year
item.description: Halving year Halving is a process of reducing the rate sending to miners when cryptocurrency is generated. There are some large Capitalization coins halving this year and they show great influence on cryptocurrency marcket. Here are some halvings you should know: Is the end of BTC bullish? BTC pullback came as expected and 10% dropped since 2020/2/13. Alts are slumping during the period. I can’t help to ask that does the BTC bullish end?

item.title: Lessons learned
item.description: Day trading and lessons learned order to increase fund utilization, today I tried day trading and felt sucks for my operation. It’s quite different from what I usually do. it’s more vulnerable and having less time to think. Need to enter when chance come and get out when wrong immediately. Yellow line shows where I get in and out. It’s obvious not right to hold so long during day trading and no operation when finding enter the wrong position.
